attributes.action: Pass a policy giving students and young students recognition for their contributions, not only to their communities, but to their schools, families and country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students, as well as the entire of young people are being given a bad image by a select few individuals, which is then exacerbated out of proportion by older generations who do not understand the way we think or the way we are: they criticize urban sports, such as skateboarding and Parkour, because they don't understad us. They criticize us with harsh words, because they are not willing to accept that tiems are changing, and otu childhoods are different from theirs. This is not just, and we want young people to be respected, not looked down on.
